description: It can take a single mp4 and find everything there is to know about that movie including actors, trailers, subtitles. and similar movies.
Does what it says, solid Jellyfin Client
summary: Does what it says, solid Jellyfin Client

description: My server is kinda weak so transcoding content on it can be slow, this just lets my laptops with QSV do all of the transcoding themselfs
i simply love this sofware. easy and fast

The video quality difference between viewing files via the browser and mpv is barely comparable. I am not educated in what is happening behind the scenes, but videos played on mpv are just flawless. I feel like it uses more batteyr but I have nothing to back this up.
Very smart, keeps Jellyfin great ergonomy for browsing and add a reliable player on top of it !
summary: Reads almost every format / codec without server reencoding
